content: विजृंभ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To yawn, gape, open the mouth; व्यजृंभिषत चापरे <ls>Bk. 15. 108</ls>; विजृंभितमिवांतरिक्षेण <ls>Mk. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To open, expand (as a flower) {@--3@} To spread everywhere, pervade, fill; सुखश्रवा मंगलतूर्यनिस्वनाः… न केवलं सद्मनि मागधीपतेः पथि व्यजृंभंत दिवौकसामपि <ls>R. 3. 19</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 72</ls>; रजोंधकारस्य विजृंभितस्य <ls n="R.">7. 42.</ls> {@--4@} To rise, appear, show, manifest oneself; तत्खल्विदं विजृंभते <ls>Māl. 7.</ls> {@--5@} To spring back (as a bow). {@--6@} To display activity. {@--7@} To become increased or developed.
